mapper.insert: insert into join_tb(uname, uid, upw, uemail, ugender, address1, address2, address3, ubirth, uphone) values(#{uname},#{uid},#{upw},#{uemail},#{ugender},#{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3},#{ubirth}, #{uphone})
mapper.select: select uid, uname from join_tb where uname=#{uname} and uphone=#{uphone}
select upw, uname from join_tb where uid=#{uid} and uname=#{uname}
mapper.update: update join_tb set uname = #{uname}, upw = #{upw}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, address3 = #{address3}, uphone = #{uphone} where uid = #{uid}
